alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued May 07 at 1:50AM MDT until May 08 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph possible. * WHERE...Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass, and Central Highlands. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains
